trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during a cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: 当加密操作中出现错误时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> uses the HRESULT CORSEC_E_CRYPTO, unless an alternate error code is specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> 使用 HRESULT CORSEC_E_CRYPTO，除非指定备用的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>，请参阅构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的成员<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> with no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>不带任何参数。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>类。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="HRESULT" /> error code.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="HRESULT" /> 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> class with the specified <see langword="HRESULT" /> error code.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <see langword="HRESULT" /> 错误代码初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException.%23ctor%2A> constructor accepts a system `HRESULT` error code and sets the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property to a localized message that corresponds to the `HRESULT`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数接受一个系统`HRESULT`错误代码和集<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性对应的本地化消息`HRESULT`。

trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>使用错误的错误代码<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicUnexpectedOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: Property

`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> using a custom error message.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何构造<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>使用自定义错误消息。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>类。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>inner</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>inner</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.target: Property

The inner exception reference.
trans-unit.target: 内部异常引用。

trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。
